statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 AND customer_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE date_submitted > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 2;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE product_id = 101
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, feedback_text, rating FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY customer_id, feedback_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY product_id, feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 2 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC, customer_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text AS review, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND rating > 2
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE description LIKE '%premium%'
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, budget FROM marketing_data ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, budget FROM marketing_data WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Promotion%';
SELECT preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT strategy_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM marketing_strategies JOIN campaign_feedback ON marketing_strategies.id = campaign_feedback.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT MAX(rating), MIN(rating), AVG(rating) FROM product_rating WHERE product_id = 5001;
SELECT id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM campaign_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC LIMIT 5;
